articles.title: Iceland declares state of emergency over escalating earthquakes, and volcano eruption fears - Euronews
articles.description: Iceland has 33 active volcanic systems, the highest number in Europe, and thousands of tremors have been recorded since the end of October.
articles.content:
Iceland has 33 active volcanic systems, the highest number in Europe, and thousands of tremors have been recorded since the end of October. 
 Authorities in Iceland have declared a state of emergenc… [+2120 chars]
